original: bi sha la ne tra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: bi sha la ne tra s'a dha nam /

translated: The Means of Achievement of Wide-Eyed One

original: aom bi sha la ne tri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom bi sha la ne tri sv'a h'a /

original: zhes pa 'di chu klung gi 'gram du nyi ma re la khri phrag re re zla ba tsam bzlas la nya'i nub mo mtshan yal gyis bzlas pas tho rangs kyi dus su nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di chu klung gi 'gram du nyi ma re la khri phrag re re zla ba tsam bzlas la nya'i nub mo mtshan yal gyis bzlas pas tho rangs kyi dus su nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Recite this ten thousand times a day for a month on the bank of a river. At the end of the night, recite until dawn. She will definitely come.

original: byung nas chung mar gyur nas nyi ma re la nor lnga lnga ster ro //
analyzed: byung nas chung mar gyur nas nyi ma re la nor lnga lnga ster ro //
translated: When she comes, she becomes one's wife and gives five coins a day.

original: 'di rnams kun rig pa mang po bzlas pa'i gang zag la nyi ma re res 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams kun rig pa mang po bzlas pa'i gang zag la nyi ma re res 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: All of these are accomplished by a person who recites the many mantras of the all-knowing one.

original: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: spyan yangs ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The Means of Achievement of Wide-Eyed One is complete.
